help.main:
Usage: handy-kit <command> [options]

Commands:
  license-gen <type> --author "Name"   Generate an open-source license (Supported: MIT, Apache-2.0, BSD-3-Clause, GPL-3.0, MPL-2.0, Unlicense)
  git-standup --days <n>              Show git commits from last n days
help.license-gen:
Generate an open-source license

Usage:
  handy-kit license-gen <type> --author "Your Name"

Examples:
  handy-kit license-gen MIT --author "Alice"
  handy-kit license-gen Apache-2.0 --author "Bob"

Supported licenses:
  MIT, Apache-2.0, BSD-3-Clause, GPL-3.0, MPL-2.0, Unlicense
help.git-standup:
Show git commits from the last n days

Usage: handy-kit git-standup --days <n>

Options:
  --days <n>   Number of days to look back (required)
  -h, --help   Show this help message

errors.unsupportedLicense:
❌ License type '{{type}}' not supported.
Supported types: MIT, Apache-2.0, BSD-3-Clause, GPL-3.0, MPL-2.0, Unlicense
errors.invalidDays: ❌ Invalid argument: --days <n> must be a positive integer
errors.noCommits: ℹ️ No commits found in the last {{days}} day(s)
errors.notAGitRepo: ❌ Not a git repository or unable to fetch logs.

success.licenseGen:
✅ License '{{type}}' successfully generated by {{author}}.
 License saved to '{{outputPath}}'
success.gitStandup: ✅ Showing git commits from the last {{days}} day(s).
success.licenseCreated: ✅ License file {{type}} created successfully by {{author}} at {{outputPath}}
success.gitStandupNoCommits: ℹ️ No commits found in the last {{days}} day(s).
